verbs.description: [ARG0: astros] [V: sweep] [ARG1: indians] [ARGM-PRP: to advance to alcs with 11 - 3 win in game 3] the houston astros advanced to the al championship series for the second straight year completing a division - round sweep of cleveland on monday with an 11 - 3 win in game 3 helped by two key throwing errors from indians reliever trevor bauer houston astros marwin gonzalez trevor bauer astros al george springer cleveland carlos correa marwin gonzález
